programme.title: DC's Legends Of Tomorrow S2 - EP 15
programme.desc: The Legends land in France during World War I and enlist the aid of J.R.R. Tolkien to retrieve the last pieces of the Spear of Destiny from the Legion of Doom.

programme.title: DC's Legends Of Tomorrow S2 - EP 16
programme.desc: The Legion of Doom re-writes history after obtaining the Spear of Destiny, potentially changing the Legends forever.

programme.title: Elephant: King Of The Kalahari
programme.desc: The African elephant is the biggest land mammal on Earth and Botswana is home to more than anywhere else in the world. It's the setting for a titanic battle, especially as they are shadowed by some of the most ruthless predators on earth - lions.

programme.title: Whacked Out Sports - EP 3
programme.desc: This series features sports mishaps, crashes and bloopers from all around the world.

programme.title: Divided (US) - EP 5
programme.desc: Each episode consists of four contestants playing as one team who must agree on answers to questions they are given. The longer it takes the team to come to an agreement, the less money the team earns for each question.

programme.title: The Ellen DeGeneres Show 17 - EP 52
programme.desc: (Encore) Ellen welcomes Helen Hunt and Paul Reiser ("Mad About You").

programme.title: Just For Laughs Gags 18 - EP 19
programme.desc: Just For Laughs will tickle everyone's funny bone with its hilarious practical jokes, hidden camera pranks, and other creative hijinks.

programme.title: Zoom Zim Zam S2 - EP 7
programme.desc: Join Zoom, Zim and Zam, superheroes with superpowers, as they take you around the alphabet galaxy and teach you a different alphabet everyday. Today's alphabet is G. A giant bear has escaped and is on the loose at the Alphabet Galaxy! Will our superheroes manage to return the giant bear to the Giant Galaxy?

programme.title: Leo The Wildlife Ranger - EP 12
programme.desc: Leo, Katie and Hero get to know a feathery new friend - an Indian peacock! They bring the peacock to the rainforest to look for peahens, but end up crossing paths with two jungle cats. The Junior Rangers bring a wild boar in their garden back to the forest. There, Ranger Rocky advises the Junior Rangers to find the boar's sounder, which is a group of female wild boars and their young children.

programme.title: Tree Fu Tom S3 - EP 2
programme.desc: A fantasy, action-adventure series which follows the amazing adventures of a young boy, Tom.

programme.title: Kate & Mim-Mim S2 - EP 22
programme.desc: Kate and her stuffed toy friends use their imaginations to go on wild and incredible adventures.

programme.title: Hi-5 S17 - EP 9
programme.desc: Iconic children's pop group Hi-5 continues to teach kids about animals, colours, music and more.

programme.title: Hi-5 S17 - EP 10
programme.desc: Iconic children's pop group Hi-5 continues to teach kids about animals, colours, music and more.

programme.title: Transformers Cyberverse - EP 17
programme.desc: When Bumblebee can't remember what his current mission on Earth is, Windblade repairs his memory chips, enabling him to rediscover his past adventures on Cybertron. When his memories are being repaired, Bumblebee gets a clue that will lead both him and Windblade to complete their mission and save their friends, unaware that a team of Decepticons are tracking them too!

programme.title: Kody Kapow S1 - EP 6
programme.desc: Kody Kapow is about an aspiring martial arts-style superhero named Kody who spends the summer with his extended family in a small village in China. His grandfather, a martial arts master, teaches Kody ancient lessons of mindfulness, patience and perseverance, which Kody employs as he and his super spy cousin Mei set off on adventures in the village together with their tiger friend Goji.

programme.title: Sonic Boom S2 - EP 7
programme.desc: Sonic, Tails, Amy, Knuckles, and Sticks reside on Seaside Island in Hedgehog Village. Together, they defend the island from various threats like Doctor Eggman and his robotic creation.

programme.title: Marvel's Guardians Of The Galaxy Yr 1 - EP 22
programme.desc: It's up to the Guardians to protect the universe from Thanos, Ronan, Loki and other villains!

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago S5 - Possession - EP 4
programme.desc: A grieving Lloyd is possessed by the ghost of Morro - the Master of Wind and Wu's first student. In Lloyd's body, Morro renders the other ninja powerless before stealing Wu's staff. This relic has the power to open the fabric between realms, enabling the powerful Preeminent to enter the NINJAGO world!

programme.title: Word Whiz Or Slime Pit S2 - EP 3
programme.desc: Dr Slime is back with more slime and a new and improved slime lab! Contestants will have to beat Dr Slime to solving the word puzzles, otherwise they'll get slimed and get stuck in his game forever!

programme.title: On The Red Dot - COVID-19: Alone. Together. - EP 3
programme.desc: Jobs are lost, lives upturned and businesses on the brink of collapse as the circuit breaker slams across Singapore in a move to stop the devastating effects of COVID-19.

programme.title: Coronavirus: How Clean Is Your House?
programme.desc: Filmed entirely around the viral breakout and presented by Dr Javid Abdelmoneim alongside Dr Lisa Cross Coronavirus: How Clean is Your House features consumer science and expert advice, giving us the definitive guide on keeping ourselves and loved ones safe inside our homes. The internet and the fast-paced news environment mean that conflicting information travels quickly. In these unprecedented times, how do we know what to believe, which sources can we trust?

programme.title: Homefest: James Corden's Late Late Show Special
programme.desc: Hosting from his garage, James Corden chatted via video call with special guests from all over the world, who also put on special musical performances - from the safety of their homes. Feature Billie Eilish, Andrea Bocelli, BTS, Dua Lipa, John Legend and many others.

programme.title: Films & Stars - EP 645
programme.desc: Films and Stars cover the hottest events from the big screen every week.

programme.title: The ZhuZhus - EP 2
programme.desc: The ZhuZhuPets are no ordinary pets, they are EXTRAORDINARY and they can talk! Always on a quest for fun, they have to stay on their tiny toes to keep up with the non-stop action, laughs and adventures.

programme.title: Big Hero 6: The Series Yr 1 - EP 2
programme.desc: Based on Walt Disney Animation Studios Oscar-winning feature film.

programme.title: Power Rangers Ninja Steel - EP 2
programme.desc: A new team of superhuman power rangers must work together and use their new ninja powers to prevent evil from dominating the human race and from destroying the planet earth and the universe.

programme.title: Transformers Robots In Disguise S4 - EP 15
programme.desc: An animated series set years after Transformers: Prime, it follows Bumblebee as he leads a ragtag group of Autobots back to Earth when Decepticons crash land on the planet.

programme.title: Cardfight!! Vanguard - EP 40
programme.desc: The new season embarks on a new story with Aichi and Kai returning to take up the helm as the main protagonists. Many beloved characters such as Misaki Tokura, Kamui Katsuragi and Ren Suzugamori appear as well.

programme.title: Fableicious - EP 3
programme.desc: The Queen announces a royal duel to win her daughter's hand in marriage, and evil (but goofy) brothers, Burn Ellard and Ash Ellard, plan on winning the gladiator competition and becoming King. But their meek step-brother, Cinder Ellard, has unexpected tricks up his sleeve.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 - EP 1
programme.desc: Michael Carbonaro is a magician by trade, but a prankster by heart. In THE CARBONARO EFFECT, Michael performs baffling tricks on unsuspecting people in everyday situations, all caught on hidden camera. Everyone is left stunned and delighted, even though they have no idea what just hit them.

programme.title: The Simpsons 31 - EP 5
programme.desc: After visiting Aquatraz Water Park, Lisa and Bart set out to free from captivity the most vicious animals in Springfield. Homer fulfills a lifelong dream and buys a boat.

programme.title: XXX: Return Of Xander Cage
programme.desc: Xander Cage (Vin Diesel) comes out of self-imposed exile, thought to be long dead, and is set on a collision course with deadly alpha warrior Xiang (Donnie Yen) and his team in a race to recover a sinister and seemingly unstoppable weapon known as Pandora's Box.

programme.title: 数学荒岛历险记 S4 Math's Island S4 - EP 9
programme.desc: In this new series, Luke and his buddies met a new friend, CODEMAO. They help the residents of the town to solve their problems using the power of programming and mathematics, and the use of intelligence technology changes their lives. 在这新系列,故事讲述罗克和小伙伴们遇到了新的朋友编程猫，大家一起帮助小镇的居民们，使用编程和数学的力量解决问题，让小镇越来越智能化，智能科技改变了人们的生活。.

programme.title: 玩具不插电 Toys Unplugged - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) In this episode, the hosts introduce the nostalgic flag eraser game. They also learn rowing in a pool from a water sports coach. Follow them to the theatre and talk to the puppetry instructor to understand more about traditional puppetry art. The hosts also introduce a simple and fun game, Kerplunk. (重)在本集节目，主持人介绍的怀旧游戏是斗橡皮擦！他们也请来水上活动教练，体验在泳池学习划艇技巧。接着，随他们前往剧坊，拜访偶戏指导老师，了解这项传统艺术。最后，主持人将为大家介绍Kerplunk这个简单又好玩的游戏！.

programme.title: 聚爱圆梦 The Wish - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) Recent years haven't been easy for married couple Kamsiah and Sulaiman, who are doing their best to get by. After losing their son, their health took a turn for the worse. Find out how The Wish team fulfils their special wishes and help them rekindle their love for life. (重)近年来，甘莎和苏莱曼这对年老的夫妻竭尽所能地度过生活难关。自从俩老失去儿子后，他们的健康状况变得更糟。 让我们看“聚爱圆梦"”团队如何实现他们的特殊愿望，并帮助他们重新燃起对生活的热爱。.

programme.title: 一家之宝 Our Family Joy - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) Shane Pow visits an inter-ethnic family who enjoys sports and outdoor activities. He "babysits" the 2 kids experiencing parenting life for his first time. Knowing that Rezal and his wife love camping, Shane arranges a glamping session, while the 2 kids help out with decor and food preparation. (重)谁说有了孩子，就得牺牲玩乐、放弃旅行？异族夫妻Rezal和Wynn每周末都排满户外活动，让2个孩子跟着他们一起冒险玩乐。他们每年也会带两宝出国，体验房车自驾游的公路之旅。本集节目，热爱运动的包勋评探访了这家人，最后决定与2个孩子一起策划特别的露营活动，送给父母一个难忘的回忆。.

programme.title: 星光灿烂 The Glittering Days - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) Xu Wen Hui is a popular singer who was forced to take part in all sorts of singing competition by her adopted father, Jin Long. He treats Wen Hui like a money making machine. She became withdrawn and temperamental. By her own talents, Wen Hui became a very established singer but it did not last long (PG)(重)当红流行歌手徐雯蕙因绯闻遭唱片公司解约，养父蔡金龙强迫她投靠她的生母苏小小。主演：龚慈恩，陈凤玲，童冰玉。.

programme.desc: (R) Guang Hui secures the leading role in a youth drama. Meanwhile, An Ya's confidence is shaken because her roles are limited to portrayal of ugly women. programme.title: 第一主角 The Lead - EP 8

programme.title: 春花望露 Spring Flower - EP 461

programme.title: 《我们的岛屿》 The Islands That Made Us - EP 1
programme.desc: Singaporeans don't often think of themselves as islanders. But the outlying islands are rich in cultural and social history. This feature gives us access to some of Singapore's most unique islands. 新加坡原本由70多个岛屿组成，现在只剩下44个。在这些仅存的岛屿当中，你熟悉的会有几个？圣约翰岛曾经是英国殖民地中，最大的检疫站；乌敏采石场东南一公里外的小镇，是岛上最热闹的地方；2014年，新加坡在南部岛屿，建立了第一个海洋生态园。想对新加坡本岛以外的岛屿有更深一层的认识，就不要错过了《我们的岛屿》。.

Because of their father's invention dream, the Chao brother's lives are about to change. (PG)赵居财，一生致力研发酱油产品，与妻李锦琇育有五个孩子；居财虽然希望众孩子之中有人接手经營家业，但也尊重孩子们的兴趣和志向。赵家兄弟也因为父亲赵居财的「发明梦」，人生逐渐起了变化。.

programme.title: 一切从昏睡开始 While You Were Away - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) Sen Mei is in a coma, and Zi Jun has to manage responsibilities from both work and family. programme.title: 食在有价值 For Food's Sake! - EP 1

programme.title: 我的打拚日记 Workman Diaries - EP 14
programme.desc: (R) In Tokyo, making a living is an uphill battle from young to old. An elderly barber runs a failing business with his wife, by curbing expenses to meagre $12 a day. A freelance street performer decided to pursue an alternative career after graduation but now with marriage on the cards, he worries about his future. And for a young single mother, her divorce left her stigmatised and when she finally found a job, her income is still insufficient to support her child's education cost. (重)曾经日赚1000新元的理发师，为什么沦为‘下流老人'，一日花费仅限12新元？拒绝成为主流白领，41岁街头表演艺人结婚成问题。30岁养老院护理员服务于日本最具潜力的行业，却存不了孩子未来的教育费。看高龄少子化问题如何冲击日本社会。.

programme.title: 台湾1001个故事 3 Taiwan's 1001 Stories 3 - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) Hosted by Bai Xinyi, this food programme introduces Taiwan's traditional cuisines and their ingredients and spices. It also discloses touching stories behind the cuisines. (重)介绍台湾在地食材的故事，也是台湾最深刻的人生故事。故事的主角们，有的为着有机农业奋斗打拼，为这片土地奉献青春与血汗。 有的则是经过千百次的调味与尝试，只为了成就一道美味料理。对比着经营者与料理人的故事，他们或是为生活中年转业、或是离乡背井追寻梦想，人生路上各自遭逢百转千折的冲突与适应，才能在逆境中成功蜕变。.

programme.title: 边缘青年 Forgotten Youths - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) Ten students committed suicide in Japan due to bullying in 2016. Nanami Omori became a suicide victim after enduring more than a year of bullying by classmates. But her school claimed it had no knowledge bullying took place. The number of reported cases of bullying in Japanese schools has hit a record high, but why does bullying remain invisible? (重)9月1号是日本学校暑假结束后开学的第一天；也是每年18岁以下青少年自杀率最高的一天。学生不愿回学校的原因之一，跟校园霸凌紧紧相关。2016年，就有十位学生因为霸凌而自杀。校园霸凌在日本为什么日益严重？.

programme.title: 天上的约定 The Promise - EP 43

programme.title: 我的契约老公吴先生 My Contracted Husband, Mr Oh - EP 8
programme.desc: (R)(Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) With Zuodou's advice, Shengzhu invites her good friends to visit them with their husband. Her good friends are very happy for Shengzhu when they see Shengzhu and Zuodou interacting intimately. Enzhao cannot get over Zuodou and tries all means to get him back to her. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)在作斗的建议下，胜珠邀请好友带着老公前来探访。好友见胜珠和作斗互动亲密恩爱，替胜珠感到很开心。恩照无法忘记作斗，不断想尽方法尝试让他回到自己身边。.

programme.title: 爱到最后 Love To The End - EP 71
programme.desc: (Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Taizhu orders all chain companies to object to having their accounts checked. Xianji thus broadcasts the voice recordings of Taizhu and Shenghe to the whole company to expose their wrong-doings and urge all employees and directors to do the right thing for the company. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)泰洙命令所有的连锁公司拒绝审查，不让贤基找到犯罪证据。贤基于是把泰洙和胜赫的录音档播给全公司员工听，让大家知道泰洙和胜赫所做过的丑事，并呼吁员工们和理事们共同决定公司的未来。.

programme.title: 爱到最后 Love To The End - EP 72

programme.title: 食在有价值 For Food's Sake! - EP 2
programme.desc: Prices of bananas are on the rise, but who are really benefitting? Lennard travels to find out how food fads, farm fires, and deadly diseases are costing us our daily serving of fruit. 主持人到东南亚各地查看国际大事如环境污染及定价丑闻对食物价格的影响，让聪明的消费者对盘中物的价格有更深的了解。.

In the new Borneo series, we will explore how the different community in Sabah observe Ramadan to share their unique experience with the world audience.

programme.title: Dekatkan Jarak Kita - EP 11
programme.desc: Drama about Sofiya who has to live with her aunt after the death of her p parents. Umi Khadijah does not know that her husband Kamil has an evil intentions against Sofiya. He instigated Tasriq to hate Sofiya. Then one day, Umi Khatijah is shocked when she heard Sofiya missing while swimming in the river. Kifli found Sofiya while fishing and brought her home. He decided to adopt her after she cannot remember her family. Unfortunately, Sofiya has a life-threatening illness. Zainab try to console Alysa. They would work together to find ways to save Khadijah from the evil plan of Kamil and Kiah. Khadijah’s still feel hurt with what had happened. Then Tashriq refuses to engage with Riena because he knows that Riena has cooperated with Kiah and Kamil. But Kamil does not want to give up. Tashriq goes to see Umie Zainab and Alysa. Khadijah and Kiah come along and are saddened with what they saw.

programme.title: Abang Lori Ohsem - EP 3
programme.desc: For Luqman, all his life he has always wanted to be a pilot. Never did he realise that one day, his ambition will take a drastic change when he becomes a lorry driver instead and his nickname "Abang Lori Ohsem".But his life take a turn when he meets a female pilot and falls for her. After being laid off from his cleaner job, Luqman's good friend offer him a job as a lorry driver.While going for his first delivery, he gets involved with an accident with Lufia's car. For endangering her life, Lufia seeks compensation from Luqman.

programme.title: Juang Di Rantauan - EP 3
programme.desc: Mae is a caregiver to an elderly lady. Her pay goes to building a new house and sending her youngest brother to university. Her house has been poorly built. Instead of a proper home, the house is missing a ceiling, and the floors are made of broken concrete. Mae has to go home to sort the matter out with her contractor, and also meet her beloved family. Presented by Dalina Jaapar, Juang Di Rantauan delves into the lives of migrant workers who help to make Singapore tick. programme.desc: Listen and watch RZ & TG as they go on a live simulcast on both Warna 942 and Suria!

programme.title: Sihat Oh Sihat - EP 2
programme.desc: The doctors of SOS SIHAT OH SIHAT with the panel of experts and celebrity discuss on the topic of heart attack. What are the early signs of an attack and what can trigger it? A medical expert shares on what actually happen during a heart attack. And a first aid tip on the basic actions that one can take when there is a nearby attack.

programme.title: My Coffee Prince - EP 20
programme.desc: Adapted from Korea's most popular drama series, Coffee Prince tell the story of four young people who meet together at a cafe as they navigate through love, life and their dreams.Raikal is a smart young man who hates the idea of being tied down to one career. Reluctant to join the family business, he is ordered by his grandmother to manage a cafe. Though reluctant to run the cafe, he slowly begins to immerse himself in the gourmet coffee business. Though Raikal has not been treating Dani well and wants her out from his café, she insists on staying on as this is the only way she can spend time with him. Raikal remains defiant but cannot hide his feelings that he really likes Dani.In the meantime, Mariam wants to end her relationship with Amri and move to New York with Ricky.

programme.title: Empat Penjuru - EP 5
programme.desc: Uda reluctantly joins the early Hari Raya celebration with her family. However, she gets upset when Along arrives late with his family to the village. Instead, she takes her anger out on Angah. As a result, both of them gets into an argument. The following day, Amir blames Uda when her lie about his mother admitted to the hospital turns into a reality.

programme.title: Ceria Ramadan - EP 3
programme.desc: Host: Khairudin Saharom, Mastura AhmadCeria Ramadan touches on how one can strengthen his spirituality through charity work, mindful speech and contributing to the betterment of humanity. Mendaki lends out about 200 laptops to support needy students for the Home-based Learning. Meanwhile, Shah quickly gets anxious when Rosie suggest him to be the Imam for their tarawih prayer.

programme.title: Ketuk Ketuk Ramadan 2019 - EP 12
programme.desc: Everyone's favourite cooking show Ketuk Ketuk Ramadan is back with more exotic recipes and juicy news. Hosted by Sheila Rusly with a popular invite artiste every week.Among artiste featured are Ayda Jebat, Fendy Bakry, Khai Bahar, Emma Maembong, Nabila Huda, Andi Bernadee, Elly Mazlein, Amelina, Diana Danielle, Faizal Tahir, Aliff Satar, Ariff Bahran, Fatin Afeefa and many more. Host: Sheila RuslyEpisode 12: Aidil AzizTelur Sweet Sour - Aidil AzizSpageti Sambal Belacan Mangga - Sheila RuslyGet the special recipe from guest artiste Aidil Aziz as he prepare ‘ Telur Sweet Sour ‘ while Sheila shares her recipe for ‘ Spageti Sambal Belacan Mangga’. A simple dish for breaking fast during this Ramadan.

programme.title: Hey Mr Spotlight - EP 3
programme.desc: When her school results deteriorate, Hazri becomes worried and decided to get his good friend Azraf to be his sister Raisya's tuition teacher. Reluctantly, he agreed to the offer but Raisya was against it. They had a rough journey together when Raisya's prone to arguing with Azraf which always leads him to lose his patience. Though frequently disagreeing with each other, unknowingly, Azraf has secretly set his eyes on Raisya without her realising it. For the sake of both his mother and sister, Hazri had to sacrifice his marriage plans with Farhana. This however frustrates Farhana who has been longing to marry him.Furious at his delaying tactics, Farhana's mother warn him that she will accept anyone who decides to propose her daughter.

programme.title: Berita 2020-2021 - EP 35
programme.desc: Catch the latest local and international news on Suria.

programme.title: Kek Champion S2 - EP 4
programme.desc: A fun, quirky and exciting reality baking competition where 12 home bakers battle it out to be the champion. Every episode will have a theme and two main challenges that individual contestants have to take it in their stride and figure out how to emerge as champion. In this magical episode, we follow our 9 remaining bakers as they attempt to fulfil the wishes of Princess Huda, and give her a fairytale ending.

programme.title: Ti Amo, Sweetheart 100 Hari! - EP 2
programme.desc: A reconciliaton between a woman searching for his missing husband who has taken their child away from her and their reconciliation as they stay together for 100 days trial period for the sake of their child. Malissa’s mother urged her to leave Italy quickly and seek divorce from Iskandar. Meanwhile, Rania has secretly engaged someone to stop the reunion of Melissa and Iskandar. Melissa goes to search Iskandar’s room after an argument with him. She found letters that she never written in Iskandar’s drawer. Then Melissa sees Iskandar talking with Fendi as she walks into a cafe. Later Iskandar seeks Melissa forgiveness and ask for a second chance.

programme.title: Rintihan Hati - EP 7
programme.desc: Fazli decides to leave Rozi and start life anew. Fazli goes back to Jamals house to look for Fitri but finds the house abandoned. Fitri has to juggle between work, school and taking care of Jamal. Suzana tracks Fazli down and forces him to give her money.

programme.title: Vanakkam Singai - EP 8
programme.desc: Gather round for another refreshing episode of Vanakkam Singai with Rafi and Guna. While Nathiya brings us on a spin for tamil tongue twisters, Jaynesh gets the inside scoops of traditional VS modern weddings. Sharon dazzles us with some amazing collections of Indian bangle varieties, while Shamini serves up some heavenly Ondeh Ondeh Granola Oats to perk up your Sunday morning. Dont miss out on Vanakkam Singai coming to you on Sunday at 9am only on MediaCorp Vasantham.

programme.title: Chemistry of Kariyappa
programme.desc: Uttara and Chitra fall in love and get married but within three months, she decides to divorce him citing that he is impotent. Uttara's father, Kariyappa, resolves to find a solution.

programme.title: Gopurangal Saivathillai
programme.desc: Murali, a handsome and successful sales manager, is disappointed with his wife's physical appearance and leaves her behind.

programme.title: Nenjukulle 2
programme.desc: An unplugged music variety show that will feature a live band and a guest celebrity who will share with us their favourite songs. This season, we have Super Singers joining us.

programme.title: Builder
programme.sub-title: The art and science of trail building
programme.desc: Explore the craft of trail building through the eyes of some of MTB's best riders and most respected builders. Director Scott Secco captures the craft of trail building through the eyes of some of MTB's best riders and most respected builders. More than just shovelling dirt, these artisans sculpt well-flowing trails by detecting key nuances in the earth.

programme.title: Rotation
programme.desc: Team Liquid attempts to qualify for TI4 while training with the high performance team, but tensions rise. Team Liquid's training includes not only team building and practice sessions, they're also working out in the gym with the high performance team. But high expectations and a tech glitch yield rising tensions when it's time to qualify for TI4.

programme.title: Respawn
programme.desc: Jimmy reflects back on his and Liquid's peformance at TI4 and the team's split in the disappointing aftermath. Jimmy reflects on TI4 and critiques his performance there. He also reflects on how the intensity of championship play in Seattle brought out Liquid's teamwork dysfunctions. In the aftermath of their poor results, the team opts to part ways.

programme.title: Against the Odds
programme.sub-title: The story of a new team coming together
programme.desc: This is the story of Team OG’s incredible journey from underdogs to contenders for gaming’s biggest prize. In 2018, OG were at rock-bottom, hit by painful departures and scrapping in qualifiers for Dota 2's TI8. Against the Odds is the fairytale of this broken team's shot at Gaming’s biggest prize.

programme.title: The Crew on a Cruise
programme.desc: After the premiere of the new show in Austria, the Flying Steps hit the high seas to perform on a cruise ship. After the premiere of the new show in Austria, the Flying Steps hit the high seas to perform on a cruise ship. Robozee has his debut as the lead choreographer for a futuristic holographic show and gives a tour of his hometown of Kassel, Germany.

programme.title: Distance Between Dreams
programme.desc: During a historically big winter, iconic surfer Ian Walsh is out to redefine the ceiling on paddle surfing. A crew of top surfers, headed by Ian Walsh, attempt to paddle in on one of the world’s biggest waves: Jaws. Already formidable, the Hawaiian break's been sent to new heights by weather phenomenon El Niño.

programme.title: Carson Storch’s hairy tale of grizzly bears
programme.desc: Deep in the Yukon, a crew of mountain bikers are confronted by a family of grizzly bears. Without radio contact or bear repellent, a group of professional mountain bikers had a too-close-for-comfort encounter with a group of grizzly bears deep in the Yukon.

programme.title: Jeff Provenzano’s tree-top hangout
programme.desc: Wingsuit BASE jumper Jeff Provenzano recalls the time he ended up landing 60ft off the ground in a tree. Wingsuit BASE jumper Jeff Provenzano recounts the time a less-than-perfect landing saw him end up dangling from a tree in a Swiss mountain forest. He hung there, 60ft off the ground, for three hours until a helicopter rescue team plucked him out.

programme.title: Perspective
programme.desc: Four skaters from different backgrounds and styles convene in Arizona to explore new territory and tricks. Reflecting on how their different backgrounds influence their skating styles, four world class skaters join forces in Arizona to explore new territory and tricks.

programme.title: Frozen Rush
programme.desc: The world's first-ever off-road truck race on snow features Pro 4s navigating some slippery slopes. The world's first-ever off-road truck race on snow features eight 900bhp Pro 4s driven by the best in the world, including Ricky Johnson and Bryce Menzies, who navigate the slippery slopes in front of 10,000 fans.

programme.title: Blood Road
programme.desc: Rebecca Rusch rides 1,930km along the infamous Ho Chi Minh Trail through the dense jungles of Vietnam. In this award-winning film, Rebecca Rusch cycles 1,930km along the Ho Chi Minh Trail through the jungles of Vietnam. The goal is to reach the site where her father, a US Air Force pilot, was shot down in Laos more than 40 years earlier.

programme.title: Lil Zoo
programme.sub-title: Route to Red Bull BC One
programme.desc: B-Boy Lil Zoo from Morocco shares his journey to Red Bull BC One that began in 2012. B-Boy Lil Zoo from Morocco shares his journey to Red Bull BC One that began in 2012 as he worked his way through wins and losses to get where he is today.

programme.title: Lil Zoo part 2
programme.sub-title: Route to Red Bull BC One
programme.desc: With one month to prepare for Red Bull BC One World Final B-Boy Lil Zoo is focusing on stamina and strength. With one month to prepare for Red Bull BC One World Final B-Boy Lil Zoo is focusing on stamina and strength. See how he mentally and physically prepares to battle.

programme.title: Pet Projects
programme.desc: Meet game developers passionate about their pet projects: an iPad game for cats and Butt-Sniffin' Pugs. When it comes to indie game developers, thinking outside the box is a way of life. For example, these two teams: one working on iPad games for cats, and a husband and wife duo working on a one-of-a-kind game called Butt-Sniffin' Pugs.

programme.title: Cult Classic Redux
programme.desc: Two cult classics receive modern-day tributes, a testament to their impact and cultural legacy. The internet cartoon Homestar Runner and the kid's television show Knightmare both have huge cult followings that go back decades. Now both are receiving modern-day tributes, a testament to their impact on pop culture.

programme.title: Cut Your Teeth
programme.sub-title: The highs and lows of rock and roll
programme.desc: Follow the lives of several bands who are committed to living an alternative, rock and roll lifestyle. This documentary delves into the world of living a life dedicated to rock and roll and alternative culture. Ride with the bands and hear stories from the road. Learn how much commitment it takes to ride the ups and downs of a musician's life.

programme.title: The Fastest Sport on Skates
programme.desc: This is the story of how the unlikely pairing of hockey and boardercross became a global racing phenomenon. From a race down a hill covered in fish market ice to a World Cup series that pulls in a quarter of a million spectators annually, this is how the unlikely mashup of a hockey fight and boardercross became the exciting sport of Ice Cross Downhill.

programme.title: Marcel Hirscher remains the king
programme.desc: After another decorated season, Marcel Hirscher looks ahead to the FIS Alpine Ski World Cup finals in Andorra. Marcel Hirscher looks ahead after another decorated season while Marco Odermatt and Alexis Pinturault do their best to race well at the FIS Alpine Ski World Cup finals in Andorra.

programme.title: Skiing says so long to Aksel Lund Svindal
programme.desc: As skiing pays tribute to retiring Aksel Lund Svindal, the men's DH World Cup goes down to the wire. After one of the greatest alpine skiing careers, we pay tribute to Aksel Lund Svindal as he bows out of his racing career after the world championship in Sweden, while Dominik Paris and Beat Feuz go to war for the World Cup downhill title.

programme.title: Great Things
programme.desc: Jimmy "DeMoN" Ho and Team Liquid start a month-long stay at Red Bull's eSports Studio in California. Jimmy "DeMoN" Ho and Team Liquid start a month-long stay at Red Bull's eSports Studio in Santa Monica, where they begin training for TI4. During counseling, the team discovers they have communication and trust issues that need to be addressed.
